name: Uno Platform Material Toolkit
description:
Uno Material Toolkit is a library for designing with the Uno Platform. Use it with the Uno plugin to auto-generate front-end design and preview your app directly in Figma. Enjoy building pixel-perfect apps!


Watch the demo here.
